name: Stand There
content: We lay in the wake of destruction
Tell me that you're awfully sorry
So i can push you off me
I can scream at you not to touch me
Ill follow you like a lost puppy
Then tell me how ugly i am
But that you'll always love me
That well have each others backs
I may have hit you three times
Our love is crazy were nuts
Square feet of it to the ground
Ain't sh*t you can do about it
